title: About
text:
Proficient across multiple categories including Quantitative Analysis, Project Management, Technical Drawing [CAD/CAM], and Sales. Deep expertise of Building and Fabrication Trades acquired from decades of hands-on industrial experience. Skilled Captain with a demonstrated history working in the Maritime Industry.

You can view or download my CV here:
View My CV

title: Jason Theodore Stopas
text:
Welcome to My GitHub page
Data-driven analyst with an MS in Applied Business Analytics (Boston University) and a proven record leading high-stakes operational decision-making across maritime, agriculture, and construction environments. Combines hands-on field expertise with rigorous quantitative methods - bridging theory and practice in ways most analytics candidates cannot. Proficient in Python, SQL, and Excel, with applied experience in regression, classification, forecasting, and optimization. A clear communicator who translates analytical insight into operational strategy and stakeholder-ready narratives. USA and EU (Greece) citizen.
